subject: Re: [junit] Junit can't find my test classes
msgSnippet: ... I would start by pasting the  definition directly into your  task and eliminating that potential source of problems. Maybe you ll see a
messageBody:
davidcnoel wrote:

> I'm sure the problem must be trivial but I'm just not seeing it.

I would start by pasting the <classpath> definition directly into your
<junit> task and eliminating that potential source of problems. Maybe
you'll see a typo.
